Description: JOB OBJECTIVE:Provide support to the development of campaign management strategy related materials by conducting data analysis, collection and compiling activities; manage the day-to-day campaign implementation / execution activities and evaluation of campaigns.KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:Functional Responsibilities:·Conduct research based on the identified methods, objectives, data sources and timelines to build an understanding of trends, customer behaviors, visitor segments and possible dates in the region·Provide support in the development of regional campaign management strategies in alignment with overall DCTCM marketing strategy·Draft yearly regional campaign plans and conduct analysis to support the identification of scope, components, required investment levels, media frequency, engagement methods, target audiences and market mix·Propose organizations, celebrities and/ or influencers to be partnered with during the implementation of regional campaigns·Prepare materials (e.g. presentations, visuals etc.) to be used during meetings with prospecting partners (e.g. organizations, influencers, celebrities) to provide information on DET's campaigns·Attend to brainstorming sessions to develop new campaign ideas and ensure all aspects of campaign planning and implementation are considered·Work on activities such as development of success measures, analysis on economic considerations and budget allocation/ optimization to detail new campaign ideas·Prepare presentation materials to be used during management meetings·Draft campaign briefs to be shared with agencies and ensure their alignment with approved campaign plans and details·Participate selection process of third party providers/ agencies and conduct follow-ups with the bidders if required·Communicate with third party providers (e.g. consultants, agencies) on day-to-day basis regarding to activities related to DET's campaign development and execution needs; exchange information and resolve inquiries·Handle the day-to-day roll out of campaigns to ensure delivery of all agreed campaign elements; escalate any unresolved issues·Manage the facilitation of production requirements such as organization of Pre Production Meetings, shoot logistics, edits and material review, trafficking of assets to media partners·Communicate with other marketing departments to facilitate delivery of campaigns as per plan·Draft campaign performance related reports and identify discrepancy areas for further investigation and analysis·Provide support content production activities by communicating with relevant internal and external parties and collecting informationMinimum Qualifications:·University/College Degree in a related fieldMinimum Experience:·5+ Years of relevant experienceJob Details
